DestinationDetails.Activities: take a photo with AboElhol(spinx) and with the pyramids take your breakfast at a site of pyramits
DestinationDetails.Attractions: see the three famous pyramit (Khufu, khafre, Menkaure)
DestinationDetails.Includes: Tour guide, Air-conditioned vehicle, Entry tickets
DestinationDetails.description: The Giza Pyramid Complex is one of the most iconic archaeological sites in the world and a timeless symbol of ancient Egyptian civilization. Home to the Great Pyramid of Khufu—one of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World—it stands as a remarkable achievement of engineering, architecture, and human ambition.  Located on the Giza Plateau near Cairo, the site includes the pyramids of Khufu, Khafre, and Menkaure, along with the Great Sphinx, creating a unique historical landscape that has fascinated travelers for centuries. Visitors can explore the monumental structures, learn about ancient burial rituals, and experience the mysteries surrounding their construction.  Today, the Giza Pyramids remain a must-visit destination for tourists from around the globe, offering an unforgettable journey into Egypt’s rich history, culture, and enduring legacy.
DestinationDetails.name: Giza Pyramids
DestinationDetails.shortDescription: One of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World and a world-famous archaeological site
